system.description: The character's powers arise from high-tech devices that are well beyond the limits of modern-day engineering. This can come in many forms.
system.examples: Doctor Octopus (Otto Octavius), Gauntlet (Joseph Green), Mysterio (Quentin Beck), the Trapster.

system.description: The character relies on technolopy for powers. When they take damape that would render them unconscious they can instead choose to lose all of their technology-related powers and remain conscious with 1 polnt of Health remaining. Assuming the character has access to parts and tools. Lost powers can be repaired after a battle
